title: Web Server's Default Page
cleaned_text: What is Plesk [Plesk](https://www.plesk.com/) is a hosting [control panel](https://www.plesk.com/blog/business-industry/whats-control-panel-all-you-need-to-know/) with simple and secure web server, website and web apps management tools. It is specially designed to help web professionals manage web, DNS, mail and other services through a comprehensive and user-friendly GUI. Plesk
